document_data.name: Ormantor
document_data.mainbody: '''Ormantor''' was one of the bodyguards for [[Marlin Stormserpent]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was immense and very muscular.
document_data.Personality: He usually said nothing, but thought his lord's caginess was kind of stupid.
document_data.Activities: He worked as a bodyguard for [[Marlin Stormserpent]].
document_data.History:
By {{yearlink|1479}}, Ormantor had served Marlin Stormserpent for six or seven seasons.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|187|18}}

Ormantor accompanied Marlin Stormserpent on his way to the [[Dragonskull Chamber]] in [[Castle Obarskyr]], when the latter wanted to try out the power of the ''[[Blueflame item]]s''.
